programme.title: Golfing the World
programme.desc: Kerry is home to some of the world's best ranked courses but in this episode we explore some of the lesser known courses including Dooks Golf Links, and the amazing Dingle Golf Links (Ceanne Sibeal) on the outer banks of the Dingle Peninsula.

programme.title: Golfing the World
programme.desc: Golfing the World explores beautiful New England. Take a trip "down the Cape" at two classic mini tracks in Yarmouth: Bayberry Hills and Bass River with legendary local Jim Hallet. Then head to the hills for two outstanding courses and a lot more at the Quechee Club in Vermont. Experience summer in New England.

programme.title: Golfing the World
programme.desc: Highlighting golf courses and private resorts from around the world.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Fishing enthusiast Charlie Moore, also known as "The Mad Fisherman," is stepping out of his comfort zone and into the worlds of his guests, but first they have to visit his. In each episode, a special guest is invited into Charlie's world, and then the roles are reversed. When it's his turn, Charlie immerses himself in the local culture of the town he visits, wanting to experience everything that makes it special, from the best places to eat to favorite fishing destinations, and nobody is safe from his comedic critiquing.
